correctness.rationale: Several key fields are incorrect, non-traceable, or misuse units, despite many correctly captured elements (precursors, PEALD method, subcycle sequence, GPCs, substrate, temperature, plasma power). Major issues: (1) Pressure: set to 10.0 mmHg, but the article reports total pressures in Pa and per subcycle: 10 Pa (InOx) and 20 Pa (GaOx, ZnOx) (Table 1). If expressed in mmHg, these correspond to ~0.075 and ~0.150 mmHg, not 10.0 mmHg; also a single value ignores per-sublayer differences. (2) Number of cycles: recorded as 12, but the article states 12 supercycles with a 3/3/2 subcycle ratio for PE(1/1/1), i.e., (3+3+2)*12 = 96 total ALD cycles. (3) DosingTime and PurgeTime units: schema uses MilliSEC, but numeric values are in seconds from the article (e.g., 0.04 s, 5 s, 1 s, 2 s, 4 s). Values must be converted to ms (40, 5000, 1000, 2000, 4000 ms). (4) FlowRates: coReactantFlow is set to 150 sccm, but 150 sccm refers to N2 purging after the O2 plasma step, not O2 flow (O2 flow not reported). purgingGasFlow is set to 100/90/120 sccm, which are the N2 carrier flows during precursor dosing (Table 1), not the post-plasma purge flow; this mapping is incorrect. (5) FilmThickness: set to 8 nm while the article reports 7–9 nm depending on sequence; for the 3/3/2 PEALD recipe [PE(1/1/1)] the text cites ~7 nm. (6) MaterialProperties contain non-traceable/fabricated values: optical properties (n, absorption, band gap, Tauc), electrical resistivity/carrier density/mobility (and “Hall measurements”), uniformity, conformality, roughness (AFM), and film density (XRR) are not reported in the paper. (7) DeviceProperties (mobility, Vth, SS, on/off, device structure) are not measured in this study (they report MIS J–E, not TFT metrics), so these values are fabricated. (8) FilmComposition.elementalConcentration ‘values’ set to 1% is nonsensical; no such overall concentration is reported; however, the atomic ratio 1.0:1.0:1.1 is correct for PE(1/1/1) from XPS. (9) A reported special purge detail is missing/misrepresented: a longer 40 s purge after the last TMGa dose is required (GaOx subcycle); current purge entries list only 2 s/1 s and omit this. Properties to correct/review: processParameters.pressure (unit and value), thicknessControl.numberofCycles, dosingTime and purgeTime units, flowRates (coReactantFlow vs purge flows), filmThickness (align with the specific recipe), remove or mark as not reported the optical/electrical/uniformity/conformality/roughness/density/deviceProperties, and fix elementalConcentration content to match available XPS/EDX data.

completeness.rationale: Multiple core elements are missing, incorrect, or not traceable to the article, and several schema-relevant details are inconsistent: (1) Missing processes: The article reports several distinct IGZO ALD processes (PEALD supercycles PE(1/1/1), PE(1/1/2), PE(2/1/1), PE(1/2/1) and a mixed PEALD/TALD T(1/1/1)), but only one process (PEALD 3/3/2) is extracted. Each should be a separate process object with its own subcycle counts and thickness outcomes. (2) Time units wrong: Dosing and purge times are given in seconds in the paper (e.g., 0.04 s TMIn; 5 s O2 plasma; 4 s/1 s N2 purges) but are recorded with unit MilliSEC without converting (e.g., 0.04 should be 40 ms; 5 s should be 5000 ms). The special 40 s purge after the last TMGa dose (GaOx subcycle) is omitted. (3) Pressure incorrect: The paper reports total pressures in Pa per subcycle (InOx 10 Pa; GaOx 20 Pa; ZnOx 20 Pa; TALD-ZnO 9 Pa). The extraction lists a single 10.0 with unit MilliM_HG (mmHg), which is both the wrong unit and value (10 Pa ≈ 0.075 mmHg) and ignores per-subcycle differences. (4) Cycle count ambiguity: numberofCycles is set to 12, but the article states 12 supercycles; total ALD cycles for PE(1/1/1) would be 12×(3+3+2)=96. The schema’s numberofCycles should reflect total cycles, and the supercycle repeat count should be made explicit. (5) Non-traceable properties: Many material/device properties are not reported in the article yet are populated (refractive index, band gap, absorption, roughness, density, uniformity, conformality, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, TFT device metrics). These are ungrounded and should be removed or left unspecified. (6) Composition reporting: The XPS atomic ratio for PE(1/1/1) is captured (1.0:1.0:1.1), but elementalConcentration is set to 1% without meaning. Consider adding the EDX ratio (1.1/1.0/1.3) and clearly stating technique for each ratio, and avoid meaningless concentration values. (7) Supercycle details: Subcycle sequence In→Ga→Zn is correct, but the extraction should also include the other subcycle ratios (3/3/4; 6/3/2; 3/6/2) and the mixed TALD case (3/3/12 with H2O) as separate processes, including their distinct thicknesses and nucleation behavior. To improve completeness, add the missing process variants, correct units and values (times in ms, pressures in Pa or convert consistently), include the 40 s Ga purge detail, clarify total cycles vs. supercycles, and restrict properties to those reported and traceable.
